commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Reference books go on this shelf, notebooks go here...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There we go. The room's looking really nice now. What with studying and getting ready for live shows, I've really been putting this off...but a clean room is definitely best.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Huff* My goodness, my drawers are a mess... What did I put in this file folder anyway?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Huh? Oh wait, I know what this is!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Setsuna! Rina!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hi there. It's been a while.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Eli! Rin!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hi!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I missed you guys! How've you been?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Good! And you two look just the same.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Fortunately, yes. The others...aren't here yet, it seems.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No, not yet. We're still missingâ€“

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Good morning, everyone!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh wow, you're all already here, zura. Sorry we're late!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Mari, Hanamaru!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: It's been so long, you two! Thank you for coming out today!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It really has! I'm so glad you reached out to us!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Now we're all here!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I gotta say, I was super shocked to get an invite to a sports recreation park park outta the blue like that!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm sorry it was so sudden. It's just, these free passes expire today... Maybe if I'd realized I had them sooner, everyone else could've come too.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Don't worry your pretty little head at all! It's completely fine. We can go with them another time!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Exactly. Honoka and the others weren't upset at all. They just asked me to say hi to you all.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I see... Well, I'll still be more careful next time.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Umm, what is a sports recreation park, exactly? Does it involve a lot of physical exertion? I can tell it's a fun place, but beyond that...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's a big amusement facility where you can try out all kinds of sports and other activities. This'll be my first time going, too, but I've heard it's really fun.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh wow! Of course Tokyo would have a place like that! You guys really are living in the future.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Does that count...as the future?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I've never been either! I can't wait! I'm gonna play every sport they've got!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm pretty excited myself! All right everyone, let's be off!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru, Rin, Rina, Mari, Eli
commands.line: (Hanamaru, Rin, Rina) Yeah! (Mari, Eli) Yes!
